item.title: Roasted Chicken Entree
item.description: Roast chicken is a quick recipe for a nice supper. All of our side dish recipes are compatible, and hot rolls with butter tops it off. Roasted Chicken For 4 1 whole chicken (rinsed) 1 tsp Chef Frankâ€™s Seasoning 1 tsp sage (rubbed) black pepper to taste 1 tsp garlic (granulated or fresh chopped) 3 tbsp butter (melted) Roasted Chicken Directions Place chicken breast side up in roaster pan.
